data.title: Winner of Bionix 2022
data.desc: I am thrilled to be crowned as the winner of the prestigious Bionix 2022 competition. I express my heartfelt gratitude to my mentors and friends for their unwavering support and encouragement throughout the journey. This victory is a testament to our collective dedication and hard work.

data.title: 2nd Runner Up I2C 2023
data.desc: Securing the position of 2nd Runner Up in the highly competitive I2C 2023 competition fills me with immense joy and pride. I extend my deepest gratitude to my mentors and friends for their constant support and belief in my abilities. This accomplishment serves as a reminder of our collective perseverance and determination.

data.title: UI/UX Bootcamp in HabisKerja.com
data.desc: Completing the UI/UX Bootcamp at HabisKerja.com has been a transformative experience. I am grateful to my mentors and friends for their guidance and support, which has helped me refine my design skills and gain valuable industry insights. This certification is a testament to our collective passion for creating exceptional user experiences.

data.title: Best of The Best Student 29th Generation SMK Telkom Malang
data.desc: Being recognized as the Best of The Best Student in the 29th Generation of SMK Telkom Malang is a tremendous honor. I express my heartfelt appreciation to my mentors and friends for their unwavering support and belief in my potential. This award symbolizes our collective pursuit of excellence and serves as a testament to our hard work.
